Symbol.Script_2D:
if GLOB_VIEW_TYPE <> 2 or GLOB_PREVIEW_MODE <> 0 then end ROOM_NUMBER = GLOB_ID n = REQUEST ("program_info", "", name, version) if version+EPS<22 then DEFINE STYLE "ROOM" AC_TextFont_1, ROOM_LSIZE, 5, 0 DEFINE STYLE "ROOM_2" AC_TextFont_1, ROOM_LSIZE, 2, 0 name_style_1 = "ROOM" name_style_2 = "ROOM_2" rls = ROOM_LSIZE else DEFINE STYLE "ROOM22" AC_TextFont_1, AC_TextSize_1, 5, AC_TextStyle_1 DEFINE STYLE "ROOM22_2" AC_TextFont_1, AC_TextSize_1, 2, AC_TextStyle_1 pen AC_TextPen_1 name_style_1 = "ROOM22" name_style_2 = "ROOM22_2" rls = AC_TextSize_1 width_factor = AC_TextCharWidthFactor_1 charspace_factor = AC_TextCharSpaceFactor_1 endif STYLE name_style_1 area = str("%.2", room_area)
paper_scale = GLOB_SCALE/1000
HOTSPOT2 pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][1], 0, unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][2], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][1], pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][2], unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][2], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][1], -1, unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][2], 3: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 0, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][2], unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][1], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][1], pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][2], unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][1], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][2], unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][1], 3: unID=unID+1
add2 pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][1],pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][2]
txt = " " txt2 = " " if ishow_zone_type = 1 or ishow_zone_type = 5 or ishow_zone_type = 0 or ishow_zone_type = 7 or ishow_zone_type = 8 or ishow_zone_type = 10 then txt = GLOB_ID if ishow_zone_type = 2 then txt = ROOM_NAME if ishow_zone_type = 3 then txt = area if ishow_zone_type = 9 then txt = name if ishow_zone_type = 11 then txt = GLOB_ID + " " + area + "кв.м." txt2 = bti_ID + " " + str("%.2", bti_area_zone) + "кв.м." endif
success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-pokr", "show_h_pot", show_h_pot)
if show_h_pot or ishow_zone_type = 11 then txt = "" txt = txt + "Hзоны: " + str("%.1mm",ROOM_HEIGHT) + "\n" if abs(hroom_pot)>EPS then txt = txt + "Hпом: " + str("%.1mm",hroom_pot) + "\n" txt = txt + "Hподв: " + str("%.1mm",ROOM_HEIGHT-hroom_pot) + "\n" endif endif
if ishow_zone_type = 11 then txt = txt + "Отделка: " + tip_otd + "\n" txt = txt + "Пол: " + tip_pol + "\n" txt = txt + "Потолок: " + tip_pot if germ_pot=1 then txt = txt + ", ГЕРМЕТИЧЕН" txt = txt + "\n" endif !i=0 !i = i-1 : text2 0,i,"ROOM_WALLS_SURF =" + str("%.2", ROOM_WALLS_SURF) !i = i-1 : text2 0,i,"ROOM_BOUNDARY_SURF =" + str("%.2", ROOM_BOUNDARY_SURF) anchor = 5 if ishow_zone_type = 9 then anchor = 4
if vartype(txt)=1 then txt = str("%.0",txt) TEXTBLOCK "txt" 0, anchor, 0, width_factor, charspace_factor, 1,txt REQUEST("TEXTBLOCK_INFO", "txt", width, height) twidth = width * paper_scale theight = height * paper_scale
if ishow_zone_type = 1 or ishow_zone_type = 5 or ishow_zone_type = 0 or ishow_zone_type = 7 or ishow_zone_type = 10 then DRAWINDEX 50 RICHTEXT2 0, -theight/4, "txt" DRAWINDEX 30 if Rcir = 0 then CIRCLE2 0, 0, rls * 0.0012 * A_ set fill f POLY2_ 2,1+2+4,0,0,900,rls*0.0012*A_,360,4000+1 else CIRCLE2 0, 0, paper_scale * Rcir set fill f POLY2_ 2,1+2+4,0,0,900,paper_scale*Rcir,360,4000+1 endif if ishow_zone_type = 7 then TEXTBLOCK "txtar" 0, 5, 0, width_factor, charspace_factor, 1,area REQUEST("TEXTBLOCK_INFO", "txtar", width, height) twidth = width * paper_scale theight = height * paper_scale del 1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][1], 0, unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][2], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][1], pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][2], unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][2], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][1], -1, unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][2], 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][2], unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][1], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][1], pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][2], unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][1], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][2], unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][1], 3: unID=unID+1 add2 pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][1],pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][2] RICHTEXT2 0, theight/4, "txtar" line2 -twidth/2, 0, twidth/2,0 endif endif
if ishow_zone_type = 5 then if tip_otd_sten<>"" and tip_otd_sten<>" " and tip_otd_pol<>"" and tip_otd_pol<>" " then HOTSPOT2 pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][1], 0, unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][2], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][1], pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][2], unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][2], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][1], -1, unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][2], 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][2], unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][1], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][1], pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][2], unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][1], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][2], unID, pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][1], 3: unID=unID+1 add2 pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][1],pos_xy[ishow_zone_num+8][2] TEXTBLOCK "txt11" 0, anchor, 0, width_factor, charspace_factor, 1,tip_otd_sten TEXTBLOCK "txt22" 0, anchor, 0, width_factor, charspace_factor, 1,tip_otd_pol REQUEST("TEXTBLOCK_INFO", "txt11", width11, height11) REQUEST("TEXTBLOCK_INFO", "txt22", width11, height22) width33 = 0.9 * max(width11, width22) * paper_scale if width33<0.4 then width33 = 0.4 CIRCLE2 0, 0, width33 line2 -width33, 0, width33,0 RICHTEXT2 0, -theight*0.7, "txt11" RICHTEXT2 0, theight/4, "txt22" endif endif
if ishow_zone_type = 2 or ishow_zone_type = 11 then RICHTEXT2 0, -theight/4, "txt"
if ishow_zone_type = 3 then RICHTEXT2 0, rls*0.0007*A_, "txt" line2 -twidth/2, 0, twidth/2,0 endif
if ishow_zone_type = 4 or ishow_zone_type = 6 then text2 0, 0,GLOB_ID + " " + ROOM_NAME if ishow_zone_type = 4 then text2 0, -8*paper_scale, area + " " + "кв.м." if ishow_zone_type = 6 then htx = 0 : hty = 0 htxt_1 = 3 htx = htx + htxt_1 : text2 hty, -htx*paper_scale, ov_Temp_wint_txt+"/"+ov_Temp_summ_txt htx = htx + htxt_1 : text2 hty, -htx*paper_scale, ov_System htx = htx + htxt_1 : text2 hty, -htx*paper_scale, "П: "+ov_norm_In_txt+" "+ov_In_txt htx = htx + htxt_1 : text2 hty, -htx*paper_scale, "В: "+ov_norm_Out_txt+" "+ov_Out_txt endif endif
if ishow_zone_type = 8 then RICHTEXT2 0, -theight/4, "txt" if pb_user>0 then text2 0, -8*paper_scale, str("%.0",pb_user)+" чел." endif
if ishow_zone_type = 9 then RICHTEXT2 0, 0, "txt"
if ishow_zone_type = 10 then TEXTBLOCK "txtcat" 0, 5, 0, width_factor, charspace_factor, 1,U REQUEST("TEXTBLOCK_INFO", "txtcat", width, height) twidth = width * paper_scale theight = height * paper_scale add2 0, -theight*0.9 RICHTEXT2 0, -theight/4, "txtcat" if U<>"" then rect2 -twidth, -theight/3, twidth, theight/3 add2 0, -theight*0.7 endif del 1 endif
if ishow_zone_type = 11 then TEXTBLOCK "txt_bti_1" 0, 5, 0, width_factor, charspace_factor, 1,txt TEXTBLOCK "txt_bti_2" 0, 5, 0, width_factor, charspace_factor, 1,txt2 REQUEST("TEXTBLOCK_INFO", "txt_bti_1", width1, height) REQUEST("TEXTBLOCK_INFO", "txt_bti_2", width2, height) twidth = max(width1,width2) * paper_scale theight = height * paper_scale RICHTEXT2 0, theight/4, "txt_bti_1" RICHTEXT2 0, -theight/4, "txt_bti_2" line2 -twidth/2, 0, twidth/2,0 endif
del 1
if vin_arr[ishow_zone_num] then DRAWINDEX 10 HOTSPOT2 0, pos_xy_vin[ishow_zone_num][2], unID, pos_xy_vin[ishow_zone_num][1], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xy_vin[ishow_zone_num][1], pos_xy_vin[ishow_zone_num][2], unID, pos_xy_vin[ishow_zone_num][1], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, pos_xy_vin[ishow_zone_num][2], unID, pos_xy_vin[ishow_zone_num][1], 3: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 pos_xy_vin[ishow_zone_num][1], 0, unID, pos_xy_vin[ishow_zone_num][2], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xy_vin[ishow_zone_num][1], pos_xy_vin[ishow_zone_num][2], unID, pos_xy_vin[ishow_zone_num][2], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xy_vin[ishow_zone_num][1], -1, unID, pos_xy_vin[ishow_zone_num][2], 3: unID=unID+1 line2 pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][1],pos_xy[ishow_zone_num][2], pos_xy_vin[ishow_zone_num][1],pos_xy_vin[ishow_zone_num][2] endif
show_pol = 0 : success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-pokr", "show_pol", show_pol) if show_pol and tip_pol<>"Не задан" then STYLE name_style_2 k_scale = 1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xv, 0, unID, pos_yv, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xv, pos_yv, unID, pos_yv, 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xv, -1, unID, pos_yv, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, pos_yv, unID,pos_xv, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xv, pos_yv, unID, pos_xv, 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, pos_yv, unID, pos_xv, 3: unID=unID+1 DRAWINDEX 30 if SQR(pos_xv_pol*pos_xv_pol+pos_yv_pol*pos_yv_pol)>0.17 then line2 pos_xv, pos_yv, pos_xv_pol+pos_xv, pos_yv_pol+pos_yv add2 pos_xv,pos_yv HOTSPOT2 pos_xv_pol, 0, unID, pos_yv_pol, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xv_pol, pos_yv_pol, unID, pos_yv_pol, 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xv_pol, -1, unID, pos_yv_pol, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, pos_yv_pol, unID, pos_xv_pol, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xv_pol, pos_yv_pol, unID, pos_xv_pol, 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, pos_yv_pol, unID, pos_xv_pol, 3: unID=unID+1 add2 pos_xv_pol, pos_yv_pol mashtab = GLOB_SCALE / 100 MUL2 mashtab,mashtab k = 0.8 MUL2 k,k DRAWINDEX 0 text2 0.5*k_scale,k_scale*0.6,tip_pol DRAWINDEX 40 set fill f POLY2_B 4,1+2+4,0,19, 0,0,1*k_scale,1*k_scale,0,1*k_scale,0.5*k_scale,0.87*k_scale,1*k_scale, 0,0,-1 hotspot2 0.5*k_scale,0.87*k_scale/2,unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 0.5*k_scale,0.87*k_scale,unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 0,0,unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 1*k_scale,0,unID : unID=unID+1 endif
Symbol.Script_VL:
ROOM_NUMBER = GLOB_ID parameters ROOM_NUMBER = ROOM_NUMBER
dim name_arr[] : i=0 i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Тамбур" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Лестничная клетка" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Коридор"
i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Помещение хранения уборочного инвентаря" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Кладовая"
i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Электрощитовая" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Операторская" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Кабинет"
i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Кладовая грязной спецодежды" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Кладовая чистой спецодежды" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Раздаточная спецодежды"
i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Мужской санузел" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Женский санузел" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Санузел с тамбуром" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Санузел"
i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Преддушевая" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Мужская душевая" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Женская душевая"
i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Мужская гардеробная спецодежды" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Мужская гардеробная уличной и домашней одежды" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Женская гардеробная спецодежды" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Женская гардеробная уличной и домашней одежды"
i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Цех" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Склад" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Блок реагентов" i=i+1 : name_arr[i] = "Производственное помещение"
values 'ROOM_NAME' CUSTOM, name_arr
if auto_mat and is_cfg_mview then values 'tip_otd' category, CUSTOM
values 'plst' "системной переменной", "по периметру СТЕН", "по периметру ЗОНЫ", "по наружной поверхности","вручную" values 'plpt' "системной переменной", "вручную"
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "vin" then vin_arr[ishow_zone_num] = vin PARAMETERS vin_arr = vin_arr endif
values{2} "ov_norm_Out" iov_norm, tov_norm values{2} "ov_norm_In" iov_norm_in, tov_norm_in
values "ov_Temp_wint" range[5,40] values "ov_Temp_summ" range[5,40]
PARAMETERS ov_Temp_summ_txt = "+" + STR("%.0",ov_Temp_summ) + "C" PARAMETERS ov_Temp_wint_txt = "+" + STR("%.0",ov_Temp_wint) + "C"
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ov_norm_Out" then PARAMETERS ov_norm_In = 99 endif
ov_norm_Out_txt = "-" : ov_norm_In_txt = "-" ov_norm_Out_t = ov_norm_Out : if ov_norm_Out = 99 then ov_norm_Out_t = ov_norm_In
if ov_norm_Out = 3 then !"По кратности" values 'ov_ed_krat_out' range [1,100] ov_norm_Out_txt = STR("%.0", ov_ed_krat_out)+ " крат" ov_Out = (ov_ed_krat_out * V) else LOCK "ov_ed_krat_out" HIDEPARAMETER "ov_ed_krat_out" endif
if ov_norm_In = 3 then !"По кратности" values 'ov_ed_krat_in' range [1,100] ov_norm_In_txt = STR("%.0", ov_ed_krat_in)+ " крат" ov_In = (ov_ed_krat_in * V) else LOCK "ov_ed_krat_in" HIDEPARAMETER "ov_ed_krat_in" endif
if ov_norm_Out = 4 then !"По теплопоступлению" LOCK "ov_tout_sum", "ov_tin_sum_wint", "ov_tin_sum_summ","ov_pt_summ", "ov_nt_wint", "ov_nt_summ", "ov_pt_wint" ov_norm_Out_txt = "По расчет на тепл." else HIDEPARAMETER "ov_tout_slab", "ov_tout_windor", "ov_tout_wall", "ov_tout_roof", "ov_tout_inf", "ov_tin_light", "ov_tin_eq", "ov_tin_sun", "ov_tout_sum", "ov_tin_sum_wint", "ov_tin_sum_summ", "ov_pt_wint", "ov_pt_summ", "ov_nt_wint", "ov_nt_summ" endif
if ov_norm_Out = 5 then !"По влаговыделению" ov_norm_Out_txt = "По расчет по влаг." else
endif
if ov_norm_Out = 6 then !"Душевая" values "ov_ed_d" range[1,100] ov_Out = ov_ed_d * 75 ov_norm_Out_txt = "75м3/прибор" parameters ov_norm_in = 1 else parameters ov_ed_d = 0 HIDEPARAMETER "ov_ed_d" endif
if ov_norm_Out = 7 then !"Санузел" values "ov_ed_t" range[1,100] parameters ov_norm_in = 1 ov_Out = (ov_ed_p * 25) + (ov_ed_t * 50) ov_norm_Out_txt = "50м3/прибор" else parameters ov_ed_p = 0, ov_ed_t = 0 HIDEPARAMETER "ov_ed_p", "ov_ed_t" endif
if ov_norm_Out = 8 then !"Кабинет" ov_Out = round_int(S/3) parameters ov_norm_in = 1 ov_norm_Out_txt = "3м3/м2" endif
!if ov_norm_In <> 2 then LOCK "ov_In" !if ov_norm_Out <> 2 then LOCK "ov_Out" if ov_norm_In = 1 then ov_In = 0 ov_norm_In_txt = "-" endif if ov_norm_Out = 1 then ov_Out = 0 ov_norm_Out_txt = "-" endif if ov_norm_In = 99 then ov_In = ov_Out ov_norm_In_txt = ov_norm_Out_txt endif if ov_In>EPS then ov_In = int(ov_In/10)*10+5*((ov_In/10-int(ov_In/10))>EPS) else ov_In = 0 endif if ov_Out>EPS then ov_Out = int(ov_Out/10)*10+5*((ov_Out/10-int(ov_Out/10))>EPS) else ov_Out = 0 endif
if not(ov_Inmun) then parameters ov_In = ov_In if not(ov_Outmun) then parameters ov_Out = ov_Out
ov_In_txt = "-" : if ov_In>1 then ov_In_txt = STR("%.0",ov_In) ov_Out_txt = "-" : if ov_Out>1 then ov_Out_txt = STR("%.0",ov_Out) parameters ov_In_txt = ov_In_txt, ov_Out_txt = ov_Out_txt
parameters S = S parameters H = H parameters V = V
if plpt = "системной переменной" then parameters pl_pt = ROOM_AREA parameters perim = ROOM_NET_PERIMETER parameters perim_st = ROOM_WALLS_PRM parameters plst_sys = ROOM_WALLS_SURF parameters plst_perim = ROOM_WALLS_PRM * H parameters plst_perimz = ROOM_NET_PERIMETER * H parameters plst_bound = ROOM_BOUNDARY_SURF parameters plst_hole = ROOM_DOORS_SURF + ROOM_WINDS_SURF parameters plst_ph = ROOM_WALLS_PRM * H - (ROOM_DOORS_SURF + ROOM_WINDS_SURF) parameters plst_phz = ROOM_NET_PERIMETER * H - (ROOM_DOORS_SURF + ROOM_WINDS_SURF) parameters plst_phbound = ROOM_BOUNDARY_SURF - (ROOM_DOORS_SURF + ROOM_WINDS_SURF) parameters span = (perim_st - ROOM_DOORS_WID) * hpan parameters plt_sys = ROOM_AREA parameters plt_bound1 = ROOM_TOP_SURFACE parameters plt_bound2 = ROOM_ROOF_TOP_SURF + ROOM_SLAB_TOP_SURF + ROOM_BEAM_TOP_SURF
if plst <> "вручную" then if plst = "системной переменной" then s_st = plst_sys if plst = "по периметру СТЕН" then s_st = plst_ph if plst = "по периметру ЗОНЫ" then s_st = plst_phz if plst = "по наружной поверхности" then s_st = plst_phbound parameters ssten = s_st - span - ssten1 - ssten2 - ssten3 - ssten4 - ssten5 endif parameters sstentot = ssten + ssten1 + ssten2 + ssten3 + ssten4 + ssten5 + span
if pb_mun then values 'pb_norm' 6, CUSTOM if pb_norm>0 then pb_user = round_int(ROOM_AREA/pb_norm) if pb_user<1 then pb_user=1 parameters pb_user = pb_user LOCK "pb_user" endif else LOCK "pb_norm" HIDEPARAMETER "pb_norm" endif dim used_tip[] success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-pokr", "used_tip", used_tip) values 'tip_pol' "Не задан",used_tip, CUSTOM values 'tip_pot' "Не задан",used_tip, CUSTOM parameters isPol=isPol, isPot=isPot if isPot then parameters germ_pot = germ_pot if hroom_pot<EPS then LOCK "VOTW2", "germ_pot" if hpan<EPS then LOCK "VOTP"
zone_param = "-" if column_perim>EPS then if zone_param = "-" then zone_param = "" zone_param = zone_param + "@Cp=" + str("%.0mm",column_perim) endif
if tip_pol<>"Не задан" then values 'type_add_pol' type_add if abs(add_s_pol)>EPS then if zone_param = "-" then zone_param = "" add_s = add_s_pol : if type_add_pol="%" then add_s = S*add_s_pol/100 zone_param = zone_param + "@AL=" + str("%.0",add_s*1000) endif else LOCK "type_add_pol", "add_s_pol" HIDEPARAMETER "type_add_pol", "add_s_pol" endif
if tip_pot<>"Не задан" then values 'type_add_pot' type_add if abs(add_s_pot)>EPS then if zone_param = "-" then zone_param = "" add_s = add_s_pot : if type_add_pot="%" then add_s = S*add_s_pot/100 zone_param = zone_param + "@AT=" + str("%.0",add_s*1000) endif else LOCK "type_add_pot", "add_s_pot" HIDEPARAMETER "type_add_pot", "add_s_pot" endif
if offPot then parameters VOTS = 0, tip_pot="Не задан" if zone_param = "-" then zone_param = "" zone_param = zone_param + "@OfT=1" LOCK "VOTS", "tip_pot" HIDEPARAMETER "VOTS", "tip_pot" endif
parameters zone_param = zone_param if STRLEN(tip_otd)<EPS or tip_otd="" or tip_otd=" " then parameters tip_otd="-"

RealNum.Name: plst_ph
RealNum.Description: "Площадь стен по периметру СТЕН за вычетом проёмов"

RealNum.Name: plst_phz
RealNum.Description: "Площадь стен по периметру ЗОНЫ за вычетом проёмов"

RealNum.Name: plst_phbound
RealNum.Description: "Площадь стен по наружной поверхности за вычетом проёмов"

Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS = 0.0001 dim tov_norm[] dim iov_norm[] : i=0 i=i+1 : iov_norm[i]=1 : tov_norm[i] = "Нет" i=i+1 : iov_norm[i]=2 : tov_norm[i] = "Вручную" i=i+1 : iov_norm[i]=3 : tov_norm[i] = "По кратности" i=i+1 : iov_norm[i]=4 : tov_norm[i] = "По теплопоступлению" i=i+1 : iov_norm[i]=5 : tov_norm[i] = "По влаговыделению" i=i+1 : iov_norm[i]=6 : tov_norm[i] = "Душевая" i=i+1 : iov_norm[i]=7 : tov_norm[i] = "Санузел" i=i+1 : iov_norm[i]=8 : tov_norm[i] = "Кабинет"
dim tov_norm_in[] dim iov_norm_in[] tov_norm_in = tov_norm iov_norm_in = iov_norm i=i+1 : iov_norm_in[i]=99 : tov_norm_in[i] = "Как в вытяжке"
dim ui_page_name[] : i=0 i=i+1 : ui_page_name[i]="Отделка" i=i+1 : ui_page_name[i]="Характеристики ОВ" i=i+1 : ui_page_name[i]="Характеристики ПБ"
dim type_add[] : i=0 i=i+1 : type_add[i]="кв.м." i=i+1 : type_add[i]="%"
ROOM_NUMBER = GLOB_ID if tip_pol<>"Не задан" or tip_pot<>"Не задан" then n_sloi_r=0 dim tolsh_r[10] dim tolsh_min_r[10] dim strih_r[10] dim pokaz_r[10] mat_r=0 germ_r = 0 for i = 1 to 10 tolsh_r[i] = 0 tolsh_min_r[i] = 0 strih_r[i] = 0 pokaz_r[i] = 0 next i endif if tip_pol<>"Не задан" then germ_r = 2 CALL "macro_read_tip" PARAMETERS tip_pol=tip_pol, RETURNED_PARAMETERS n_sloi_r, tolsh_r, tolsh_min_r, strih_r, pokaz_r, mat_r, germ_r if n_sloi_r > 0 then isPol = 1 germ_pol = germ_r endif else isPol = 0 endif if tip_pot<>"Не задан" then germ_r = 2 CALL "macro_read_tip" PARAMETERS tip_pol=tip_pot, RETURNED_PARAMETERS n_sloi_r, tolsh_r, tolsh_min_r, strih_r, pokaz_r, mat_r, germ_r if n_sloi_r > 0 then isPot = 1 germ_pot = germ_r endif else isPot = 0 endif
S = ROOM_AREA if abs(hroom_pot)>EPS and germ_pot=1 then H = hroom_pot else H = ROOM_HEIGHT endif V = S * H
unID=100 if vardim1(pos_xy)<>17 then dim emp_arr[17][2] for i=1 to 16 emp_arr[i][1]=0.1 emp_arr[i][2]=0.1 next i PARAMETERS pos_xy = emp_arr endif
success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-as", "ishow_zone_type", ishow_zone_type) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-as", "ishow_zone_num", ishow_zone_num) if not(auto_mat) then read_msg = "Ручная настройка" use_flag = 0 endif is_cfg_mview = 0 if auto_mat then success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-otd", "is_cfg_mview", is_cfg_mview) if success and is_cfg_mview then dim category[] success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-otd", "used_category", category) inx=0 for i = 1 to vardim1(category) if strstr(category[i], tip_otd)>0 and tip_otd<>"" and tip_otd<>" " and tip_otd<>"-" then inx = i i = vardim1(category) endif next i if inx=0 then read_msg = "Отсутвуют правила для типа -" + tip_otd inx = -1 else endif use_flag = 1 else inx=-1 endif
if inx>0 then dim finish_mat_pot[] dim finish_mat_wall[] dim finish_mat_pan[] dim finish_h_pan[] dim finish_mat_col[] success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-otd", "finish_mat_pot", finish_mat_pot) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-otd", "finish_mat_wall", finish_mat_wall) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-otd", "finish_mat_pan", finish_mat_pan) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-otd", "finish_mat_col", finish_mat_col) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-otd", "finish_h_pan", finish_h_pan) VOTS = finish_mat_pot[inx] VOTW = finish_mat_wall[inx] VOTP = finish_mat_pan[inx] hpan = finish_h_pan[inx] VOTC = finish_mat_col[inx] read_msg = "Правила загружены" use_flag = 1 parameters use_flag = use_flag parameters VOTS = VOTS parameters VOTW = VOTW parameters VOTP = VOTP parameters hpan = hpan parameters VOTC = VOTC else if use_flag then read_msg = "Вид не используется" else read_msg = "Ошибка, правила не загружены" endif endif lock 'VOTS', 'VOTW', 'VOTP', 'hpan', 'VOTC', 'use_flag' endif parameters read_msg = read_msg
Symbol.Script_UI:
UI_dialog `Пар-ры помещения`,440,390 n_page = 1 ui_page 1, -1, ui_page_name[n_page] ui_button ui_prev, " << ", 0,0, 30,20, gs_ui_current_page - 1 ui_button ui_next, " >> ", 35,0, 30,20, gs_ui_current_page + 1 !UI_OUTFIELD ui_page_name[n_page], 90, 0, 180, 15 sx = 5 sy = 30 k=0.40 UI_PICT "romm_otd.png", sx+105, sy+25,561*k,718*k,1+6
UI_OUTFIELD `Пот.`, sx+85, sy-1, 23,15 UI_INFIELD "add_s_pot", sx+85+25, sy-1, 43, 15 UI_TOOLTIP "Прибавка к площади потолка" UI_INFIELD "type_add_pot", sx+85+25+45, sy-1, 35, 15
UI_OUTFIELD `Пол`, sx+85+110, sy-1, 21,15 UI_INFIELD "add_s_pol", sx+85+22+110, sy-1, 43, 15 UI_TOOLTIP "Прибавка к площади пола" UI_INFIELD "type_add_pol", sx+85+22+45+110, sy-1, 35, 15
UI_OUTFIELD `Потолок`, sx+20, sy+5, 50,15 UI_INFIELD "germ_pot", sx, sy+5, 15, 15 UI_TOOLTIP "Герметичность потолка, влияет на объём зоны для ОВ" UI_INFIELD "tip_pot", sx-5, sy+20+5, 95, 15 UI_TOOLTIP "Тип потолка из ПМВ"
stxt = str("%.2", S) if tip_pot<>"Не задан" and abs(add_s_pot)>EPS then add_s = add_s_pot : if type_add_pot="%" then add_s = S*add_s_pot/100 if add_s>EPS then stxt = stxt + "+" stxt = stxt + str("%.2", add_s) endif if tip_pot<>"Не задан" then UI_OUTFIELD stxt+" кв.м.", sx-5, sy+20+25, 120,15 UI_TOOLTIP "Площадь пола, кв.м."
if hroom_pot<EPS then UI_OUTFIELD "Потолок по верху зоны", sx-5, sy+63, 130,15 UI_OUTFIELD "Принято "+str("%.mm",ROOM_HEIGHT)+"мм", sx, sy+185, 100,15 else UI_OUTFIELD str("%.mm",ROOM_HEIGHT-hroom_pot)+"мм", sx+15, sy+65, 75,15 UI_TOOLTIP "Высота от потолка до верха зоны" endif
UI_OUTFIELD "Периметр колонн, мм", sx-5, sy+90, 120,15 UI_INFIELD "column_perim", sx, sy+108, 90, 15 UI_TOOLTIP "0=Автоматически, 1=Нет колонн" if column_perim<EPS then UI_OUTFIELD "Автоматически", sx, sy+125, 100,15 if column_perim>EPS and column_perim<2/1000 then UI_OUTFIELD "Нет колонн", sx, sy+125, 100,15
UI_OUTFIELD "Высота до потолка, мм", sx-5, sy+144, 150,15 UI_INFIELD "hroom_pot", sx, sy+163, 90, 15 UI_TOOLTIP "0=Потолок по верху зоны"
UI_OUTFIELD "Высота панелей, мм", sx-5, sy+240, 115,15 UI_INFIELD "hpan", sx, sy+260, 90, 15 UI_TOOLTIP "Высота панелей, мм" if hpan<EPS then UI_OUTFIELD "Нет панелей", sx, sy+280, 100,15
UI_OUTFIELD `Пол`, sx-5, sy+305, 25,15 UI_INFIELD "tip_pol", sx+20, sy+305, 85, 15 UI_TOOLTIP "Тип пола из ПМВ"
stxt = str("%.2", S) if tip_pol<>"Не задан" and abs(add_s_pol)>EPS then add_s = add_s_pol : if type_add_pol="%" then add_s = S*add_s_pol/100 if add_s>EPS then stxt = stxt + "+" stxt = stxt + str("%.2", add_s) endif if tip_pol<>"Не задан" then UI_OUTFIELD stxt+" кв.м.", sx-5, sy+305+25, 120,15 UI_TOOLTIP "Площадь пола, кв.м."
sx = 340 sy = 25 UI_OUTFIELD `Тип отделки`, sx+10, sy, 80,15 UI_INFIELD "tip_otd", sx, sy+20, 90, 15 UI_INFIELD "auto_mat", sx-20, sy+20, 15, 15 UI_TOOLTIP "Прочитать из ПМВ" UI_OUTFIELD read_msg, sx-20, sy+40, 125,15 sy = 30
UI_OUTFIELD `От потолка до верха`, sx-20, sy+60, 120,15 UI_INFIELD "VOTW2", sx, sy+60+17, 100, 25
UI_OUTFIELD `Потолок`, sx-20, sy+103, 50,15 UI_INFIELD "offPot", sx+30, sy+103, 15, 15 UI_TOOLTIP "Убрать потолок из ведомости отделки" UI_INFIELD "VOTS", sx, sy+100+17, 100, 25
UI_OUTFIELD `Колонны`, sx-20, sy+150, 120,15 UI_INFIELD "VOTC", sx, sy+150+17, 100, 25
UI_OUTFIELD `Стены`, sx-20, sy+190, 120,15 UI_INFIELD "VOTW", sx, sy+190+17, 100, 25
UI_OUTFIELD `Панели`, sx-20, sy+240, 120,15 UI_INFIELD "VOTP", sx, sy+240+17, 100, 25
UI_OUTFIELD `Длина без стен,мм`, sx-20, sy+290, 120,15 UI_INFIELD "perim_without_wall", sx, sy+290+17, 100, 25 sx = 5 sy = 30 UI_GROUPBOX "+/- к площади", sx+80, sy-20, 220, 40 UI_GROUPBOX "Отделка", 315, sy-20, 129, 240+17+52 gosub "but" UI_OUTFIELD `Т зима`, sx+5, sy+4, 35,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_Temp_wint", sx+45, sy, 40, 20 UI_OUTFIELD `Т лето`, sx+95, sy+4, 35,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_Temp_summ", sx+135, sy, 40, 20 sy = sy+25 UI_OUTFIELD `Система`, sx+5, sy+4, 45,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_System", sx+90, sy, 300, 20 if ov_norm_In=4 or ov_norm_In=5 or ov_norm_Out=4 or ov_norm_Out=5 then sy = sy+25 UI_OUTFIELD `Система (лето)`, sx+5, sy+4, 78,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_System_summ", sx+90, sy, 300, 20 endif sy_t = sy sy = sy+25 : UI_GROUPBOX "Приток", sx, sy, 210, 100 sy = sy+20 : UI_INFIELD "ov_norm_In", sx+5, sy, 200, 20 sy = sy+25 : UI_INFIELD "ov_norm_In_txt", sx+5, sy, 180, 20 UI_INFIELD "ov_Inmun", sx+190, sy+3, 15, 15 UI_TOOLTIP "Задать приток вручную" sy = sy+25 : UI_OUTFIELD `Расход куб.м.`, sx+5, sy+4, 70,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_In", sx+80, sy, 60, 20 if ov_norm_In=4 or ov_norm_In=5 or ov_norm_Out=4 or ov_norm_Out=5 then UI_INFIELD "ov_In_summ", sx+80+65, sy, 60, 20 endif sx = 220 sy = sy_t sy = sy+25 : UI_GROUPBOX "Вытяжка", sx, sy, 210, 100 sy = sy+20 : UI_INFIELD "ov_norm_Out", sx+5, sy, 200, 20 sy = sy+25 : UI_INFIELD "ov_norm_Out_txt", sx+5, sy, 180, 20 UI_INFIELD "ov_Outmun", sx+190, sy+3, 15, 15 UI_TOOLTIP "Задать вытяжку вручную" sy = sy+25 : UI_OUTFIELD `Расход куб.м.`, sx+5, sy+4, 70,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_Out", sx+80, sy, 60, 20 if ov_norm_In=4 or ov_norm_In=5 or ov_norm_Out=4 or ov_norm_Out=5 then UI_INFIELD "ov_Out_summ", sx+80+65, sy, 60, 20 endif
sx = 5 sy = sy_t + 100 if ov_norm_Out = 3 then !"По кратности" sy = sy+30 : UI_GROUPBOX "По кратности", sx, sy, 435, 60 sy = sy+20 : UI_OUTFIELD `Приток`, sx+5, sy+4, 70,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_ed_krat_in", sx+80, sy, 85, 20 UI_OUTFIELD `Вытяжка`, sx+5+235, sy+4, 70,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_ed_krat_out", sx+80+235, sy, 85, 20 endif if ov_norm_Out = 4 then !"По теплопоступлению" sy_t = sy sy = sy+30 : UI_GROUPBOX "Теплопотери", sx, sy, 300, 70 sy = sy+20 UI_OUTFIELD `Пол`, sx+5, sy, 30,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_tout_slab", sx+5, sy+20, 40, 20 sx = sx+50 UI_OUTFIELD `Проёмы`, sx+5, sy, 45,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_tout_windor", sx+5, sy+20, 40, 20 sx = sx+50 UI_OUTFIELD `Стены`, sx+5, sy, 40,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_tout_wall", sx+5, sy+20, 40, 20 sx = sx+50 UI_OUTFIELD `Кровля`, sx+5, sy, 40,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_tout_roof", sx+5, sy+20, 40, 20 sx = sx+50 UI_OUTFIELD `Инф.`, sx+5, sy, 40,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_tout_inf", sx+5, sy+20, 40, 20 sx = sx+50 UI_OUTFIELD `Сумм`, sx+5, sy, 40,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_tout_sum", sx+5, sy+20, 40, 20
sx = 5 sy = sy+60 : UI_GROUPBOX "Теплопоступления", sx, sy, 300, 70 sy = sy+20 UI_OUTFIELD `Освещ.`, sx+5, sy, 40,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_tin_light", sx+5, sy+20, 40, 20 sx = sx+50 UI_OUTFIELD `Оборуд.`, sx+5, sy, 45,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_tin_eq", sx+5, sy+20, 40, 20 sx = sx+50 UI_OUTFIELD `Солнце`, sx+5, sy, 40,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_tin_sun", sx+5, sy+20, 40, 20 sx = sx+50 UI_OUTFIELD `Кровля`, sx+5, sy, 40,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_tout_roof", sx+5, sy+20, 40, 20 sx = sx+50 UI_OUTFIELD `ЗИМА`, sx+5, sy, 40,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_tin_sum_wint", sx+5, sy+20, 40, 20 sx = sx+50 UI_OUTFIELD `ЛЕТО`, sx+5, sy, 40,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_tin_sum_summ", sx+5, sy+20, 40, 20 sy = sy_t sx = sx+55 sy = sy+30 : UI_GROUPBOX "Тепловой баланс", sx, sy, 130, 150 sy = sy+15 : UI_GROUPBOX "Зима", sx+5, sy, 130-10, 65 sy = sy+15 UI_OUTFIELD `Избыток`, sx+10, sy+4, 55,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_pt_wint", sx+60, sy, 60, 20 sy = sy+20 UI_OUTFIELD `Недостаток`, sx+10, sy+4, 55,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_nt_wint", sx+60, sy, 60, 20
sy = sy+30 : UI_GROUPBOX "Лето", sx+5, sy, 130-10, 65 sy = sy+15 UI_OUTFIELD `Избыток`, sx+10, sy+4, 55,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_pt_summ", sx+60, sy, 60, 20 sy = sy+20 UI_OUTFIELD `Недостаток`, sx+10, sy+4, 55,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_nt_summ", sx+60, sy, 60, 20 endif if ov_norm_Out = 6 then !"Душевая" sy = sy+30 : UI_GROUPBOX "Душевая", sx, sy, 405, 60 sy = sy+20 : UI_OUTFIELD `Кол-во сеток`, sx+5, sy+4, 70,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_ed_d", sx+80, sy, 85, 20 endif if ov_norm_Out = 7 then !"Санузел" sy = sy+30 : UI_GROUPBOX "Санузел", sx, sy, 405, 60 sy = sy+20 : UI_OUTFIELD `Кол-во писуаров`, sx+5, sy+4, 90,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_ed_p", sx+100, sy, 50, 20 sx = sx+160 : UI_OUTFIELD `Кол-во унитазов`, sx+5, sy+4, 90,15 UI_INFIELD "ov_ed_t", sx+100, sy, 50, 20 endif
! !if ov_norm_Out = 5 then !"По влаговыделению" ! !else ! !endif ! ! !if ov_norm_Out = 8 then !"Кабинет" ! !endif
gosub "but"
UI_GROUPBOX "Расчёт категории", sx, sy, 200, 50 UI_OUTFIELD `Категория`, sx+10, sy+20, 55,15 UI_INFIELD "U", sx+10+70, sy+20, 80, 15
sx = sx+220 UI_GROUPBOX "Расчёт кол-ва человек", sx, sy, 210, 30*3+20 sy=sy+20 UI_OUTFIELD `Кол-во человек`, sx+10, sy, 90,15 UI_INFIELD "pb_user", sx+10+105, sy, 80, 15 sy=sy+30 UI_OUTFIELD `Расчёт по площади`, sx+10, sy, 105,15 UI_INFIELD "pb_mun", sx+10+115, sy, 15, 15 sy=sy+30 UI_OUTFIELD `Кв.м. на 1 чел.`, sx+10, sy, 105,15 UI_INFIELD "pb_norm", sx+10+105, sy, 80, 15
end "but": n_page = n_page + 1 UI_PAGE n_page, -1, ui_page_name[n_page] ui_button ui_prev, " << ", 0,0, 30,20, gs_ui_current_page - 1 ui_button ui_next, " >> ", 35,0, 30,20, gs_ui_current_page + 1 ! UI_OUTFIELD ui_page_name[n_page], 90, 0, 180, 20 sx = 5 sy = 30 UI_OUTFIELD "S="+str("%.2",S)+" кв.м.", 20, 363, 100,15 UI_OUTFIELD "Нз="+str("%.2",ROOM_HEIGHT)+" м.", 20+105, 363, 100,15 UI_OUTFIELD "Нп="+str("%.2",H)+" м.", 20+105*2, 363, 90,15 UI_OUTFIELD "Vп="+str("%.2",V)+" куб.м.", 20+105*3, 363, 100,15 return
